Title: The Big Day
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Dan Fogelman, Laura Kenar, Aurin Squire (story editor), Kay Oyegun (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: As Rebecca's pregnancy drags on, she forgets Jack's birthday, Nathan copes with his grief, and Randall inadvertently intervenes in a difficult marriage.
